input.sentences: one night everyone at work left the office building and instead of going home decided to have a party .
pictures started before they even got to the bar .
then | everyone gathered for a group picture .
output.sentences: We had a great office party last night.
I started just snapping some pictures of every one starting at the bar.
You could tell everyone was enjoying the drinks.
Some were even posing for some selfies.
I got to take a few pictures with everyone gathering together.
